sentences.en: Don't be such a hypochondriac!—there's nothing wrong with you.
sentences.cn: 别这么忧心忡忡的了！—你根本没病。

sentences.en: I used to be a terrible hypochondriac when I was young and a great reader of medical dictionaries.
sentences.cn: 我年轻时曾患有可拍的忧郁症 ，很爱读各种医学词典。

sentences.en: Sian: Exactly, this term is a combination of 'cyber' — relating to computers — and hypochondriac.
sentences.cn: 希安： 没错，这个词是与电脑有关的“网络”和“疑病症患者”这两个词的结合。 我们来听几个例句。

sentences.en: The hypochondriac remains a disreputable figure , solipsistic and even immune to the real suffering of others.
sentences.cn: 强迫症患者仍然声名不佳,他们唯我独尊,对他人真实的痛苦甚至毫不理会.

sentences.en: To this inveterate hypochondriac , at any rate, the long - time leader looked pretty good.
sentences.cn: 对于这个根深蒂固的忧郁症患者而言,无论如何, 长期 领袖看来相当不错.

sentences.en: Warhol and Gould would have roundly resisted applying the stigma “hypochondriac” to their own terrors; it would have seemed to them a humiliating admission that they were making a fuss about nothing.
sentences.cn: 沃霍尔和古尔德严厉反对被冠以“忧郁症”来解释他们的假想恐惧，他们认为承认自己正被一件不存在的东西烦躁是一种耻辱。

words.tran_cn: 过分担心自己健康的；忧郁症的

trans.tran_en: someone who always worries about their health and thinks they may be ill, even when they are really not ill
